div1.p:
pro\s tau=ta a)panth/sas o( *zwi/los e)/fh:
*)aristofa/nhs, w)= ou(=tos, e)n *lhmni/ais to\ takero\n e)/tacen e)pi\ tou= truferou= le/gwn ou(/tws :
*lh=mnos kua/mous tre/fousa takerou\s kai\ kalou/s, kai\ *ferekra/ths *krapata/llois:
takerou\s poih=sai tou\s e)rebi/nqous au)to/qi. si/nhpu d' w)no/mase *ni/kandros o( *kolofw/nios e)n me\n *qhriakoi=s ou(/tws :

ka/rdam' a)na/rrino\n te mela/mfullo/n te si/nhpu. *kra/ths d' e)n toi=s peri\ th=s *)attikh=s le/cews *)aristofa/nh parista=| le/gonta:
ka)/blepe si/napu kai\ ta\ pro/swp' a)ne/spase,
kaqa/ fhsi *se/leukos e)n toi=s peri\ *(ellhnismou=: e)sti\ d' o( sti/xos e)c *(ippe/wn kai\ e)/xei ou(/tws: ' ka)/bleye na=pu.' ou)dei\s d' *)attikw=n si/napu e)/fh. e)/xei de\ e(ka/teron lo/gon. na=pu me\n ga\r oi(=on na=fu, o(/ti e)ste/rhtai fu/sews: a)fue\s ga/r kai\ mikro/n, w(/sper kai\ h( a)fu/h. si/napu de\ o(/ti si/netai tou\s w)=pas e)n th=| o)dmh=|, w(s kai\ to\ kro/mmuon o(/ti ta\s ko/ras mu/omen. *ce/narxos de\ o( kwmw|diopoio\s e)n *sku/qais e)/fh:

kako\n to\ quga/trio\n ge/ mou sesina/piken
dia\ th=s ce/nhs. a(lw=n de\ kai\ o)/cous me/mnhtai o( kalo\s *)aristofa/nhs e)n toi=s peri\ *sqene/lou tou= tragikou= le/gwn:
kai\ pw=s e)gw\ *sqene/lou fa/goim' a)\n r(h/mata;
ei)s o)/cos e)mbapto/menos h)\ leukou\s a(/las; h(mei=s me\n ou)=n soi tau=ta, kale\ a)/nqrwpe, zhtou=nti suneiseuporh/samen su\ d' h(mi=n a)pokri/nasqai di/kaios ei)= para\ ti/ni e)pi\ tou= a)ggei/ou h( paroyi\s kei=tai, e)pi\ me\n ga\r o)/you pareskeuasme/nou poiki/lou kai\ ei)/dous tino\s toiou/tou *pla/twna oi)=da ei)rhko/ta e)n *(eortai=s ou(/tws :
o(po/qen e)/soito ma=za kai\ paroyi/des. e)n de\ *eu)rw/ph| pa/lin e)pi\ paroyh/matos dia\ pleio/nwn ei)/rhken, e)n oi(=s e)sti kai\ ta/de:

e)/mbamma toi=s a)/rtois ponhro\n gi/gnetai. kai\ kwlh=na de\ le/gousi kai\ kwlh=n. *eu)/polis *au)tolu/kw| :

ou)de\ kwlh=nes nebrw=n. a)po\ de\ tou= kwle/a sunh|rhme/non e)sti\n w(s suke/a sukh=, leonte/a leonth=, kwle/a kwlh=. *)aristofa/nhs *plou/tw| deute/rw| :

kwlh=, to\ pleuro/n, h(mi/krair' a)ristera/. *cenofw=n *kunhgetikw=|: ' kwlh=n sarkw/dh, lago/nas u(gra/s.' kai\ *cenofa/nhs d' o( *kolofw/nios e)n toi=s e)legei/ois fhsi/:

e)/st' a)\n a)oida/wn h)=| ge/nos *(elladiko/n. e(ch=s de\ tou/twn pollw=n kai\ pantodapw=n e)piferome/nwn h(mei=s e)pishmanou/meqa ta\ mnh/mhs a)/cia. kai\ ga\r o)rni/qwn plh=qos h)=n a)/llwn te kai\ xhnw=n, e)/ti de\ tw=n neossw=n o)rni/qwn ou(\s pi/pous: tine\s kalou=si, kai\ xoi/rwn kai\ tw=n perispouda/stwn fasianikw=n o)rni/qwn, peri\ laxa/nwn ou)=n pro/teron e)kqe/meno/s soi kai\ peri\ tw=n a)/llwn meta\ tau=ta dihgh/somai.

gogguli/des. tau/tas *)apolla=s e)n tw=| peri\ tw=n e)n *peloponnh/sw| po/lewn u(po\ *lakedaimoni/wn ga/stras fhsi\ kalei=sqai. *ni/kandros d' o( *kolofw/nios e)n tai=s *glw/ssais para\ *boiwtoi=s ga/stras o)noma/zesqai ta\s kra/mbas, ta\s de\ gogguli/das zekelti/das, *)ameri/as de\ kai\ *timaxi/das ta\s koloku/ntas zekelti/das kalei=sqai. *speu/sippos d' e)n
deute/rw| *(omoi/wn r(afani/s, fhsi/, gogguli/s, r(a/fus, a)na/rrinon o(/moia. th\n de\ r(a/fun *glau=kos e)n tw=| *)oyartutikw=| dia\ tou= p yilw=s kalei= r(a/pun. tou/tois d' ou)de\n a)/llo e)sti\n o(/moion ei) mh\ h( nu=n prosagoreuome/nh bounia/s. *qeo/frastos de/ bounia/da me\n ou)k o)noma/zei, a)/rrena de) kalei= tina gogguli/da, kai\ i)/sws au(/th e)sti\n h( bounia/s. *ni/kandros d' e)n toi=s *gewrgikoi=s th=s bounia/dos mnhmoneu/ei:
gogguli/das spei/rois de\ kulindrwth=s e)f' a(/lwos,
o)/fr' a)\n i)/sai plaqa/noisi xamhlo/terai qale/qwsi.
bounia/des d' i)=sai r(afa/nois kei/sqwn i)de\ dau=koi. gogguli/dos dissh\ ga\r i)d' e)k r(afa/noio gene/qlh
makrh/ te stifrh/ te faei/netai e)n prasih=|si. *khfisiakw=n de\ gogguli/dwn mnhmoneu/ei *kra/ths e)n *(rh/torsin ou(/tws
khfisiakai=si gogguli/sin o(/moia pa/nu. *qeo/frastos de\ gogguli/dwn fhsi\n ei)=nai ge/nh du/o, a)/rren kai\ qh=lu: gi/nesqai d' a)/mfw e)k tou= au)tou= spe/rmatos. *poseidw/nios d' o( a)po\ th=s stoa=s e)n th=| e(bdo/mh| kai\ ei)kosth=| tw=n i(storiw=n peri\ th\n *dalmati/an fhsi\ gi/gnesqai gogguli/das a)khpeu/tous kai\ a)gri/ous stafuli/nous. *di/filos d' o( *si/fnios i)atro\s h( gogguli/s, fhsi/, leptuntikh/ e)sti kai\ drimei=a kai\ du/speptos, e)/ti de\ pneumatwtikh/. krei/ttwn de/, fhsi/n, h( bounia\s kaqe/sthken glukute/ra ga/r e)sti kai\ peptikwte/ra pro\s tw=|
eu)sto/maxos ei)=nai kai\ tro/fimos, h( de\ o)ptwme/nh, fhsi/, gogguli\s ma=llon pe/ttetai, peritto/teron de\ leptu/nei. tau/ths mnhmoneu/ei *eu)/boulos e)n *)agkuli/wni ou(/tws:
o)pth/simon gogguli/da tauthni\ fe/rw. kai\ *)/alecis e)n *qeoforh/tw|
lalw= *ptolemai/w| gogguli/dos o)ptw=n to/mous, h( de\ tarixeuome/nh. gogguli\s leptuntikwte/ra e)sti\ th=s e(fqh=s kai\ ma/lista h( dia\ na/puos ginome/nh, w(/s fhsin o( *di/filos.

kra/mbh. *eu)/dhmos o( *)aqhnai=os e)n tw=| peri\ laxa/nwn kra/mbhs fhsi\n ei)=nai ge/nh tri/a, th=s te kaloume/nhs a(lmuri/dos kai\ leiofu/llou kai\ selinou/sshs, th=| d' h(donh=| prw/thn kekri/sqai th\n a(lmuri/da. fu/etai d' e)n *)eretri/a| kai\ *ku/mh| kai\ *(ro/dw|, e)/ti de\ *kni/dw| kai\ *)efe/sw|: h( de\ leio/fullos a)na\ pa=san, fhsi/, xw/ran gi/gnetai. h( de\ selinou=ssa th\n o)nomasi/an e)/xei dia\ th\n ou)lo/thta: e)mferh\s ga/r e)sti seli/nw| kai\ kata\ th\n a)/llhn pu/knwsin. *qeo/frastos de\ ou(/tws gra/fei: th=s de\ r(afa/nou le/gw de\ th\n kra/mbhn h( me/n e)stin ou)lo/fullos, h( de\ a)gri/a *di/filos d' o( *si/fnio/s fhsi: kra/mbh de\ kalli/sth gi/netai kai\ glukei=a e)n *ku/mh|, e)n de\ *)alecandrei/a| pikra/, to\ d' e)k *(ro/dou fero/menon spe/rma ei)s *)aleca/ndreian e)pi\ e)niauto\n glukei=an poiei= th\n kra/mbhn, meq' o(\n xro/non pa/lin e)pixwria/zei. *ni/kandros d' e)n *gewrgikoi=s:

seu=tla. tou/twn fhsi
 o( *qeo/frastos eu)xulo/teron ei)=nai to\ leuko
 tou= me/lanos kai\ o)ligospermo/teron kai\ kalei=sqai *sikeliko/n. h( de\ seutli\s e(/teron, fhsi/, tou= teu/tlou e)sti/. dio\ kai\ *di/filos o( kwmw|diopoio\s e)n *(/hrwi dra/mati e)pitima=| tini w(s kakw=s le/gonti kai\ ta\ teu=tla seutli/das kalw=n. *eu)/dhmos d' e)n tw=| peri\ laxa/nwn d# ge/nh fhsi
 ei)=nai teu/tlwn, spasto/n, kaulwto/n, leuko/n, pa/ndhmon tou=to d' ei)=nai th=| xro/a| faio/n. *di/filos d' o( *si/fnios to\ seutli/on fhsi
 eu)xulo/teron ei)=nai th=s kra/mbhs kai\ qreptikw/teron metri/ws: e)kzesto
 de\ kai\ lambano/menon meta\ na/puos leptuntikw/teron ei)=nai kai\ e(lmi/nqwn fqartiko/n. eu)koiliw/teron de\ to\ leuko/n, to\ de\ me/lan ou)rhtikw/teron. u(pa/rxein de\ au)tw=n kai\ ta\s r(i/zas eu)stomwte/ras kai\ polutrofwte/ras.

stafuli=nos. ou(=tos drimu/s e)sti, fhsi
 o( *di/filos, i(kanw=s de\ qreptiko\s kai\ eu)sto/maxos me/sws diaxwrhtiko/s te kai\ pneumatw/dhs, du/speptos, ou)rhtiko\s i(kanw=s, diegertiko\s pro\s a)frodi/sia: dio\ kai\ u(p' e)ni/wn fi/ltron kalei=tai. *noumh/nios d' e)n tw=| *(alieutikw=| fhsi:
